name: Enter Password
description:
Hack into the GMTK Game Jam Servers to give yourself a better rating!

One screen, one line, one password.

I did this entire project in 3 hours, so it is not complete, but completely playable and winnable. However, the part where an AI takes you on a text adventure to figure out the password was not completed. So I'll give you a hint: it's 7 characters, not case sensitive, no spaces, and makes sense with context. Good luck! I wish I could have worked on it more.
